name: GOO-ROO
description:
GOO-ROO is a 2-D pixel art puzzle platformer that takes an alternative approach to jumping and resource management. 

Play as little Roo, a tiny and hungry Goo on a journey to eat magical beans. Roo hops around with ease, but bigger jumps require Roo to fling itself higher, which leaves behind a part of its body. Luckily, Roo isn't a very picky eater - it can and will eat all GREEN things it comes into contact with (including its own remains). 

GOO-ROO tests both player's mechanical skills and strategy. Challenge yourself and your friends to complete all of the levels!

Features:

- Bounce around 8 different levels PLUS an additional secret boss level (!)

- Enjoy an original soundtrack featuring 4 different tracks

(Currently Windows only - Mac build potentially coming out soon!)
